_header: Not far from March in the end of Fevriere
_description: A Compleynt against unjust treatment — five stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
Not far fro marche in the ende of feueryereAllon I went vpon myn
                    awn dysport…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…That trouth shall reynge and the gouernaunceAnd hertys trew
                    to lyue in thair plesaunce
BodFair16.Facsimiles:
Norton-Smith,  John. 
             “Introduction.” 
             Bodleian Library MS Fairfax 16.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
